name: Project Ghost (Ed Casillas)
description:
NOTE: THIS IS A VERY EARLY PROTOTYPE OF A WORK IN PROGRESS; PROVIDED AS IS WITH NO WARRANTY OF ANYTHING. PLEASE LEAVE YOUR COMMENTS AND FEEDBACK.

  • Collect all the skulls and find the exit of the dungeon before your health runs out.
  • Find the map to make your journey easier.
Controls:

- Move with WASD.

- Look around with the mouse.

- Press E for action.

This is the spiritual successor of Fantasma, a game I made back in 2004, and it's also what Mary's Conjure was supposed to be back in the day.
